channel.title: CLICK HERE if u are AWESOME!
channel.description:
alrite, im tryin to make a shop on my server, and i used tut, and i finished. so i can see my NPC shop handler, but when i try to talk or trade wit him notin happen??? :confused: can some1 plz tell me how to fix it???? :confused: :confused: :confused:
Ty :confused: :confused:

item.title: CLICK HERE if u are AWESOME!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. I know you got the npc and shop done (you told me on hamachi :)). Now, search for “wanneShoP” without quotes until it says cannot find. Then, since your shop number is 31, press enter after you see:

} else if (NPCID == 903) { //Lundail PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 29; //Mage Bank Rune ShopSince you are doing shop number 31, and your npc is the silver merchant, you are to put in this:

} else if (NPCID == 569) { //Silver Merchant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; //*WHAT YOUR SHOP NAME IS*.Save it, COMPILE, and it should work!!!

Read full topic
item.source: CLICK HERE if u are AWESOME!
